title: hey riot i have a champion you might like
body: I have thought for a while how fun it would be to make a champion i was wondering if you would take a look at mine spent a while on it you might like it or you might not if you want to know my idea leave a comment saying you are interested please thanks and love the game.

replies.body:

> [{quoted}](name=RareNinja,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=klkPdsda,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-03-11T00:50:14.016+0000)
>
> nah you speak like a gurl

lmao

the name is tibuto (you can fix name not good with them) STAFF MASTER

(passive) "faith of the staff" for every kill or assist stacks his passive that give him small amounts of attack damage and attack speed that build up very good will lose i quarter of them when dies.

(Q)"explosive staff" breaks off part of his staff and throws it into an area slowing any enemy champions minions and monsters then if still in it when the explosion goes off the champion is stunned and deals 50(+attack damage) after level 10 it goes to 100 then at level 18 deals 350 also when walking through it deals 5 damage per second(+ half of total attack damage).

(W)"staff of wisdom" staff of wisdom is an aura effecting ally champions (including tibuto) giving them speed and attack speed.

and still working on the others

I like the him so far, however I think it still needs some work. I think his W should either be called "Staff of Haste" of be reworked to give allied champions mana related buffs, as wisdom is often associated with magic. I also think his Q is out of place. I think it should keep the big part "[I]f still in [range] when the explosion goes off [...] champions [are] stunned and [dealt attack damage + an additional 50]" but the rest needs a little bit of rework. Aside from that, I just think you should make sure to just not make him like Wukong {{champion:62}} .

ok i thought it might turn out lke him but im trying to avoid that
thanks for the tips too ill keep trying to get him better lol
